concept.title: Example: Alternate text for an image
concept.shortdesc: In this scenario, an image of a ticketing workflow also provides alternate text that describes the image.

conbody.p: The following code sample references an image workflow.png. Alternate text describes the workflow that is shown in the image.
conbody.codeblock: <image href="workflow.png"> <alt>The image is a workflow diagram that shows a ticketing workflow. The initial status is "Open". From there, the ticket can move to "Closed" or "In progress". A ticket that is "In progress" can move to "Done" or "Blocked". A "Blocked" ticket can move back to "In Progress" or directly to "Done". There are no steps beyond "Closed" or "Done".</alt> </image>
